data.title: How to Watch All of the ‘Planet of the Apes’ Movies in Order Online
data.meta_description: With the new 'Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes' out now, we rounded up the best way to stream all the 'Planet of the Apes' films in order online free.
data.text:
If you purchase an independently reviewed product or service through a link on our website, The Hollywood Reporter may receive an affiliate commission.

If you missing it in theaters when it was released in early May, Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes is available to stream at home. Now is the best time to catch up the other movies in the franchise, which are all available to watch online too.

The film series has been going strong for the last 56 years, with nine installments starting in 1968. All Planet of the Apes movies are all streamable on Hulu for subscribers only.

If you’re not a subscriber, you can start with a 30-day free trial here. Once your free trial is over, you can sign up for just $5.99 per month, or $59.99 for an annual plan for the ad-supported version of the streaming service — a savings of 18 percent. However, if you want to go ad-free, Hulu (No Ads) goes for $11.99 per month, or $119.99 per year (about $9.99 per month) for nearly 20 percent off the month-to-month price.

Aside from the Planet of the Apes movies, you’ll get access to Hulu Originals like Only Murders in the Building, The Bear, Reservation Dogs, Solar Opposites and others, as well as hit movies like Poor Things, Prey, Anatomy of a Fall and others.

Ahead, you can find all of the previous Planet of the Apes that are available online to watch. The movies are listed in order of release.

Based on the French novel La Planète des singes by author Pierre Boulle, which was first published in 1963, the Planet of the Apes franchise is a series of science fiction films about the on-going struggle between man and ape in the future society where apes rule the world and man is subjugated. The series started with the original Planet of the Apes in 1968, while the last movie War for the Planet of the Apes was released in 2017.

Where to Buy The Planet of the Apes Movies

If you want own a physical copy of the Planet of the Apes movies, you can pick up two boxed sets. One is the “legacy collection,” which features the first five movies in the franchise, starting at $85. And the other is most recent “reboot” trilogy, which features the last three movies. It’s is available on Blu-ray for $33 (reg. $40) and 4K Ultra HD Blu-ray for $32 (reg. $50).

Meanwhile, Tim Burton’s Planet of the Apes is available on all sorts of formats starting at just $4.

Where to Buy the Planet of the Apes Novel Online

Planet of the Apes is based on the bestselling French novel of the same name (La Planète des singes) by Pierre Boulle. It was first published in 1963. The book is available as a mass-market paperback for $8 (reg. $9) and as a Kindle e-book for $6 (reg. $10) at Amazon.

Meanwhile, Planet of the Apes novel is also available as an unabridged audiobook for $15 (reg. $17), or you can listen to it for free as an Audible audiobook for members from the retail giant.

Not an Audible member? Sign up for a 30-day free trial and get free audiobooks (includingPlanet of the Apes). The service usually auto-renews at $14.99 per month. Learn more about Audible here.
